name: Siege of the Blue Planet
description:
Siege of the Blue Planet is a topdown alien-shooter game. You can choose between 4 different agents, each one has unique abilities. There are 2 game modes, and you can choose between a solo or a local multiplayer experience.

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuvV2Yy6JVa4pl5MwxE6D6w

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SiegeOfPlanet
